description: Robert travels to interview the members of the local punk rock & roll band, 'Deep Throat'. After complimenting each member for his talent, he asks why they are called, 'Deep Throat.' The band leader, Casey, shows Robert by pulling down drummer Aaron's pants and going right down to the pubes on his tasty 8-incher. Robert is amazed... and aroused. Casey displays the same talent on guitarist Nathan Love as Robert gets hornier and hornier. Finally, Robert's awesomely thick, perfect 8-incher meets the depths of Casey's throat. Oh what a feeling! The boys do each other for a while until Aaron pokes Nathan and Casey takes a ride on Robert. Robert then stands Casey up and powerfucks his brains out. It's only Cock 'n' Roll, and they LIKE it!
title: Reality Czech: NewsHawks
